Description: King of the beasts and with the strength of a dozen men, not to mention tawny brawny good looks, the LION is a formidable choice for espionage.
Big, powerful, and cute, the PANDA eats bamboo for many hours each day.
The SNAKE, indirect cause of the fall of man and most subtle of the beasts, is a sneaky choice for getting in and out quickly.
Fast! Hard to see! Notoriously dumb! The RABBIT is a great choice for those who wish to avoid conflict.
A magical creature with a rainbow tail and the ability to grant wishes and heal all ouchies, the UNICORN is a powerful but easy-to-notice creature.
Cute, soft, with four little paws that sometimes have claws?maybe it likes you today, maybe it doesn't, who can say, it's a CAT!
